data.text: Wo mu, Awurade na manya guankɔbea;
Yɛ aso ma me,
Sɛ woyɛ me botan ne mʼaban nti,
Gye me fi afiri a wɔasum me no mu,
Wo nsam na mede me kra hyɛ;
Mikyi wɔn a wɔsom abosom huhuw;
Mʼani begye na madi ahurusi wɔ wo dɔ mu,
Womfaa me nhyɛɛ ɔtamfo no nsa
Hu me mmɔbɔ, Awurade, efisɛ me ho yeraw me;
Ɔyawdi retew me nkwa so,
Mʼatamfo nyinaa nti,
Obiara werɛ afi me te sɛ nea mawu;
Mete asomsɛm dodow a wɔka
Nanso mede me ho ato wo so, Awurade;
Me mmere wɔ wo nsam
Tew wʼanim kyerɛ wo somfo;
Mma mʼanim ngu ase, Awurade,
Mua atorofo ano,
Wo papayɛ dɔɔso,
Wode wɔn sie wʼanim bammɔ mu
Ayeyi nka Awurade!
Mebɔɔ huboa no mekae se:
Monnɔ Awurade mo a moyɛ nʼahotewfo nyinaa!
Monyɛ den na momma mo bo ntɔ mo yam,
